name: @laag/core
description: Core utilities and base classes for the laag library collection

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target node
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node

author: laag contributors
